metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25658 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: It was found that python-rsa is vulnerable to Bleichenbacher timing attacks. An attacker can use this flaw via the RSA decryption API to decrypt parts of the cipher text encrypted with RSA.

notes.Note: eslerm> upstream fix is a mitigation at best dev states that a non-Python is likely needed for fix and "Python-RSA is a pure-Python RSA implementation."

criterions.comment: python-rsa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
